DataElement.preferredName: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 Item Questionnaire Over Half the Days Subgroup Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The sum of all responses by an individual to the "Over Half the Days" column of the Generalized Anxiety Disorder - 7 Item Questionnaire (GAD-7).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 Item Questionnaire Over than Half the Days Subgroup
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A seven item validated, self-reported questionnaire for screening, and assessing the severity of generalized anxiety disorder in clinical practice and research settings._A time period that includes one-half of the total number of days plus at least one more._A subdivision of a larger group with members often exhibiting similar characteristics.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized survey developed by Robert L. Spitzer and colleagues in 2006 which is used to identify probable cases of generalized anxiety disorder and assess the severity of an individual's symptoms. This instrument consists of 7 items and one follow-up item. Each item is rated on a scale of 0-3 where 0 is 'not at all' and 3 is 'nearly every day.'

Concepts.definition: A seven item validated, self-reported questionnaire for screening, and assessing the severity of generalized anxiety disorder in clinical practice and research settings.

A subdivision of a larger group with members often exhibiting similar characteristics.
